Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual

Class Animator

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual.Animator
public class Animator extends Object
This class is responsible for handling animation states.
Author:
Aryan Rai

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update (float deltaTime)
      This method is responsible for updating the animation.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time between the last frame and the current frame.

    • render

      public void render (Renderer renderer, int x, int y)
      This method is responsible for rendering the animation.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer to use.
      x - The x coordinate to render the animation at.
      y - The y coordinate to render the animation at.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method is responsible for resetting the animation.

    • changeState

      public void changeState (int index, boolean reset)
      This method is responsible for changing the animation state.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the animation state to change to.
      reset - Whether to reset the animation after changing the state.

    • setState

      public void setState (int index, Animation animation)
      This method is responsible for setting or changing the animation state.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the animation state to set or change.
      animation - The animation to set or change the state to.
